SummaryEnglish: Homura Ren goes back to his hometown after living many years away, with his family. He barely remembers the city, and forgot all about his friends. Right in the first day, his cell phone is damaged and send to a Repair shop. When he gets it back, Ren find a different app installed. It's Monster Strike. Suddenly, a huge monster shows up, attacking him, and a voice in his cell phone asks to be release in exchange to save him.What truly is Monster Strike?

3.TitleEnglish: The Night Before Special - The Long Awaited Utopia

4.SummaryEnglish: It's a prequel story to the main events of the first season.

5.TitleEnglish: An Encore and Continuance - Pandora's Box

6.TitleEnglish: A Rhapsody Called Lucy -The Very First Song-

7.SummaryEnglish:
Oragon lived a lonely life all by himself, until one day he was pulled into a mysterious new dimension. There he learns that an incredibly powerful enemy will attack in six months, destroying his beloved Monster Strike forever!

Now Oragon must gather allies in the Strike World to save Monster Strike!

8.TitleEnglish: Monster Strike The Movie: Sora no Kanata
8.SummaryEnglish: 3 years ago, suddenly one part of Tokyo broke off and began to float in the sky. Tokyo was separated into "Old Tokyo" as the part that was floating in the air, and "New Tokyo," the part that stayed on the ground. Communication and interaction between the two Tokyos was impossible, and years passed. One day, a young girl perceives that Old Tokyo will fall back down to the ground, and she sets out on the perilous path from from Old Tokyo to New Tokyo to save the citizens from the impending crisis.

9.TitleEnglish: Monster Strike the Movie: Lucifer Dawn of Despair

1.SummaryEnglish:
Ren Homura has just moved back to his hometown of Kaminohara, but he isn't able to remember much about the time he spent there other than vague flashbacks. When he retrieves his cell phone which he had sent to a shop for repairs, he finds that a mysterious game titled “Monster Strike” has been installed on it. Unaware of its purpose or how it got there, Ren decides to open it, an action that will change his life forever as he finds himself suddenly attacked by a strange man.

Now trapped on the roof of his school which strangely has been designated as a "stage," Ren is shocked to see the man summon a realistic monster from the game, one that is more than capable of inflicting damage on a human. His only chance of getting out of this situation alive is by summoning the dragon Oragon, who tells Ren that he will crush the opposing monster for him. Unfortunately, it turns out that Oragon is a tiny dragon that is completely useless!

I've Been Eaten?!

Ren returns to the town of his childhood, Kaminohara. Strangely, Ren is unable to recall any memories of the town. Meanwhile, his smartphone installs a mysterious game called Monster Strike — heralding the start of a desperate battle!

▽ Kore ga hajime no sutoraiku! [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ The First Strike! [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ This is the Beginning Strike! [Japan: literal English translation]

2.SummaryEnglish:
Monster Strike the Animation Begins!

Awaken. The Story Takes Off!

Ren is forced into a heated battle with the bestial Fenrir X. Unable to control his companion Oragon and on the verge of defeat, a girl appears before Ren. Who could she be?

▽ Finger Hit Parade! Oragon! [Japan: literal English translation]
▽ Slingshot Away! Call Me Oragon! [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ Yubide hippare! Oragon! [Japan: original Romaji title]

NOTE: "Hippare" (ヒッパレ) is an abbreviation of "Hit Parade".

3.SummaryEnglish:
"I'll tell you all about MS."

Almost every middle school student who lives in Kaminohara plays the game "Monster Strike." Aoi invites Ren to go to this "special place" where MS addicts gather.

▽ Aoi Mizusawa's Secret [Japan: literal English translation, short onscreen title]
▽ Aoi Mizusawa's Secret [Japan: literal English translation, full title]
▽ Mizusawa Aoi (水澤葵) [Japan original Romaji title, short onscreen versioin]
▽ Mizusawa Aoi no himitsu [Japan: original Romaji title, full version]

4.SummaryEnglish:
"Once Again, But With Four!"

Ren decides to challenge the Colosseum after being inspired by the epic battles between monsters. But Aoi's a stickler and wants to do things right before joning the fray.

▽ A Night At The Colosseum [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ Mayonaka no monsutokoroshiamu [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Midnight at the Monster Colosseum [Japan: literal English translation]

5.SummaryEnglish:
"Enter the Legendary Wrestler"

Ren and Aoi are attacked by a mysterious team of junior high schoolers. Backed into a corner, the two fight back…
 
 
▽ Duel at the Shopping Mall [Japan: literal English translation]
▽ Mall Brawl [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ Shoppingumooru no kettou! [Japan: original Romaji title]

6.SummaryEnglish:
"I'm more than enough to deal with them."

Akira appears, bringing renewed hope to the desperate pair. Unfortunately, he refuses to fight as a team. Can the trio win the battle?
 
 
▽ The Glinting Blade [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ The Glinting Edge [Japan: literal English translation]
▽ Senkou no ha [Japan: original Romaji title]

7.SummaryEnglish:
"Unacceptable."

Aoi carries out Operation Recruit Akira—leading to a no-holds-barred blitz aimed at persuading Akira to rejoin the team. Is success around the corner?
 
 
▽ Akira Kagetsuki Solicitation Plan [Japan: literal English translation]
▽ Kagetsuki Akira kan'yuu keikaku! [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Operation Recruit Akira [Int'l: renamed English title]

13.SummaryEnglish:
"Are they serious?!"

There may be a connection between MS Coliseum and the strange happenings in Kaminohara. To investigate, the team sneaks into the coliseum. There an ominous shadow appears...
 
 
▽ Chouzetsu kourin [Japan: original Romaji title]
▽ Impossible Task [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ Transcendent Advent [Japan: literal English translation]

14.SummaryEnglish:
"Past despair, there was..."

Akira’s fine play should have turned the tables, but the dark aura surrounding Izanami Zero pushes the team to despair. It’s a do-or-die situation!
 
 
▽ Izanami [Int'l: renamed English title]
▽ Izanami Dies [Japan: literal English translation]
▽ Izanami shisu [Japan: original Romaji title]

15.SummaryEnglish: Monster Strike Ep. #15 returns in Spring 2016…

16.TitleEnglish: Counter! A Strike Shot for the Ages!

21.TitleEnglish: Come One and All: MS Club

51.TitleEnglish: Strike Shot! An End and New Beginnings

2.SummaryEnglish: A transfer student from America, Mana Livingston, becomes friends with the main cast and learns about the Monster Strike game, even obtaining her own ring and partner. Together everyone helps solve crises involving the energy points that draw monsters in random areas of Japan. By sealing them the monsters will stop being drawn to them. But Madarame, a CEO who reaches out to the children, is not telling them the whole truth.

4.TitleEnglish: Chicken Skewers Manliness and the Voyager

7.TitleEnglish: The Beautiful Angel's Steamy Case File

11.TitleEnglish: Even the Fortune Teller Is Baffled! Where`s the Energy Point

19.TitleEnglish: The Lady Pirate Alwida`s Arduous Battle

3.SummaryEnglish:
"When the red moon rises, the apocalypse shall visit the world..."

After many monster battles, Ren and his friends finally set all of the energy points free. But immediately afterward, Nostradamus gave a prophecy warning of a bleak future, enveloping all who heard it in indescribable anxiety. As the gang mulls over the prophecy, Mana is still struggling to understand Miroku's declaration that she holds "the power to change the world." After watching her for some time, Walpurgis tells Mana a truth she had been hiding from her. Meanwhile, Madarame is preparing to announce a new project to the world. What are his plans? And what did Walpurgis tell Mana? Are Ren and his friends headed for the dark future in the prophecy? The story finally reaches its exciting climax!

2.TitleEnglish: An Overwhelming Gap in Strength! Miroku Stands in the Way

4.TitleEnglish: Save Mana! The Decisions They Each Make

8.TitleEnglish: Only Thou Can Know What Thou Must Do

4.SummaryEnglish: The Angelic Guard, who call the heavens their home, have been tasked with collecting the orbs scattered across the world. Lucifer—a leader of the Angelic Guard with a rebellious streak, said to wield power rivaling the Almighty—carries out her duty along with Uriel, also a leader of the guard. Together, they go about executing their mission, until Holy Magistrate Keter—the one who leads the heavens under the Almighty's will—tells Uriel of Lucifer's planned rebellion. Initially in disbelief, Uriel then learns that the accusations against Lucifer may be connected to an event that once threatened to shatter the heavens.

29.SummaryEnglish: Balt places a curse over all of Lecillia, then disappears along with the Orb. Solomon and Levy both work in their own ways to lift the curse, but...

30.SummaryEnglish: Those saps are goners. With Forneus and Cassiel, Solomon seeks out Balt to save her people. Along the way however, Forneus senses that Lecillia is in danger...

31.SummaryEnglish:
Solomon and Levy have successfully held off the Great Sands' invasion on Lecillia.
But an even greater threat draws near...

32.SummaryEnglish:
Solomon has been taken captive by the Scyzari Empire. 
The guilt of endangering Lecillia weighs heavily on Levy's heart. 
What does fate have in store for these two daughters of Lecillia...

33.SummaryEnglish: - Promise me that you will protect the smiles of the people. - Many moons ago, Malkuth, newly-risen emperor of Scyzari, called for an audience with the First King of Lecillia. Not even the king, however, could have imaged Malkuth's dreadful intentions, or the harrowing events that young Solomon would witness...

34.SummaryEnglish:
- If it would save my people... my life's a small price to pay! -
Solomon resolves to save her people, even if it means giving up her life. 
Meanwhile, Balt attempts to access the forbidden book of demons...

35.SummaryEnglish:
- The light of Lecillia will not be snuffed out... -
Levy stands face-to-face with her father's murderer, 
Malkuth. Does her ice magic stand a chance against this mighty foe?

36.SummaryEnglish:
- I won't let you get away with this! -
Solomon's newly-awakened power summons forth Forneus' true form.
In a grand display of his power, the Great Marquis of the Netherworld tries to stop Malkuth, however...

37.SummaryEnglish:
Solomon and Levy finally unite to protect their beloved people. 
The final battle against the now almighty Malkuth is at hand...

42.SummaryEnglish:
Arthur faces her fellow pupil Arawin in battle, but something inside him has changed after all these years. 
What can Arthur do to stand against his blood-lust and magic blade...?!

43.SummaryEnglish:
The fearsome Decemvir Tiphereth would even block out the sun with a disco ball in the name of beauty. Arthur's group returns to Britannia,
but can they save her neon-coated friends and people...?

44.SummaryEnglish:
Arthur confronts Tiphereth's true form. With her country and life on the line, 
she stands firm in a heated battle against the Decemvir's enhanced strength.
Who will come out on top of their intense battle...?

45.SummaryEnglish: On a world where nearly all life has been wiped out, a young man named Noah gathers Orb Fragments to power his ark, dreaming of one day escaping the planet with its surviving animals. One day, some strange life forms fall from the sky! Who—or what—could they be...?!

46.SummaryEnglish:
After setting off in search of a giant Orb, Noah and the others are attacked by a strange creature called an Adaptor. 
The group manages to defeat the beast and later spends the night in a deserted town. 
There Noah reveals the origins of his mechanical body,just before they face a terrible new foe...!

47.SummaryEnglish:
Noah's group discovers an enormous Orb, but it's deep inside an Adaptor nest! 
Chesed makes a pinky swear with Noah before going off on his own to collect the Orb's energy. However...
